title: Junior Penetration Testor
description: MaxSec Junior Penetration Tester is a hands‑on, practical course designed to prepare students for entry‑level offensive security roles. Through guided labs and real‑world scenarios you will learn: information gathering and reconnaissance, scanning & enumeration, vulnerability analysis, exploitation fundamentals, post‑exploitation techniques, and targeted web application testing. The program concludes with a practical, time‑bound assessment to verify applied competency and readiness for junior penetration testing tasks.
